title: Wake Up, Rooster!
subtle: Humorous (fiction), 40 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile 40L
description: It is Rooster's job to wake up everyone on the farm each morning. What happens when Rooster sleeps too long? In Wake Up, Rooster!, a funny chain of events is set into motion when Rooster sleeps in. The book uses detailed, colorful illustrations; high-frequency words; and repetitive sentence patterns to support readers. The book can be also used to teach students how to identify cause-and-effect relationships in a story, as well as how to locate and use periods.
meta: farmer, horse, long, rooster, slept, woke
Cause and Effect : Identify cause-and-effect relationships
Rhyme : Identify and produce rhyming words
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use high-frequency word so
